nodes.text: Mandalore the Hammerborn was a Mandalorian warrior who claimed the title of Mand'alor, the traditional leader of the Mandalorian clans, at a point in time during the Mandalorians' long history. Growing up in the alleys of Kol Atorn, Mandalore the Hammerborn learned to speak Mando'a—the Mandalorian language—from the Mandalorian exiles and emigrants who had settled there, eventually developing the local accent. Mandalore the Hammerborn was remembered by Mandalorians as one of the culture's greatest leaders.

Mandalore the Hammerborn was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the bounty hunter reference book The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett. Co-authored by Daniel Wallace, Jason Fry, and Ryder Windham, the book was released October 15, 2013.
